about_the_game:
Marine Life Book

This marine life book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by creatures of the sea, expect to see mammals and crustaceans of all shapes and sizes, from giant blue whales to cute but deadly pufferfish.

Contents

The Marine Life book unlocks the following images:
  • Clownfish - 40x28
  • Pufferfish - 43x40
  • Seahorse - 100x100
  • Seal - 65x36
  • Dolphin - 68x74
  • Clam - 70x43
  • Eel - 71x87
  • Starfish - 75x69
  • Sea Snail - 78x43
  • Jellyfish - 81x98
  • Squid - 85x93
  • Turtle - 87x62
  • Shark - 87x77
  • Octopus - 91x80
  • Lobster - 91x84
  • Whale - 91x84
  • Mantaray - 92x56
  • Narwhal - 93x64
  • Crab - 94x69
  • School - 196x196
